participant_1.background:
I will make people think of the past when they see my long hair and the story they will hear will be about my father leaving.
my wife is legally deaf.
i had a girlfriend who eloped with my best friend one day.
i am a 30 year old female.
i have been working the same job for two years.

participant_2.background:
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
i live in alabama.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i wear a red purse.

content.text: What is your favorite musical artist?
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
That is great to hear! I like music that makes me feel something.
What do you do for fun?
I like to go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
That sounds like fun! I go for walks with my dog too.
What is your favorite place to explore?
I like exploring new places in Alabama. There are a lot of hidden gems here.
That is great to hear! I have never been to Alabama before.
You should come visit! There are a lot of fun things to do here.
I would love to visit! What are some of the best things to do in Alabama?
There are a lot of great historical sites here, like the Civil War battlefields and the Tuskegee Institute.
Those sound interesting! I would love to visit those sites.
You should also check out the Space and Rocket Center. It is a lot of fun!
That sounds like a great place to visit! I love space and rockets.
I am glad you like it! I think you would really enjoy it.
